prodNameC: 莫芮莎B型肝炎表面抗原篩檢試劑
ingredientsDesc:
R1：	MICROPLATE 
12 strips of 8 wells each, coated with monoclonal anti-HBs antibodies (mouse)
R2：	CONCENTRATED WASHING SOLUTION (20×) 
Tris NaCl buffer pH 7.4, ProClin 300 (0.04%)
R3：	NEGATIVE CONTROL 
Tris HCl buffer containing BSA, ProClin 300 (0.1%)
R4：	POSITIVE CONTROL (HUMAN)
Tris HCl buffer containing BSA with addition of mixture of purified HBs Ag from ad and ay subtypes, ProClin 300 (0.1%)
R6：	CONJUGATE DILUENT 
Tris HCl buffer pH 7.4 containing BSA, Tween® 20, bovine immunoglobulins and mouse immunoglobulins with sample addition control reagent, ProClin 300 (0.1%), Ciprofloxacine (10 μg/ml)
R7：	CONJUGATE 
Mouse Monoclonal anti-HBs antibodies and Goat polyclonal anti-HBs antibodies bound to the peroxidase. Lyophilized.
R8：	SUBSTRATED BUFFER 
Citric acid and Sodium acetate solution pH 4.0 containing H2O2 (0.015%) and DMSO (4%)
R9：	CHROMOGEN PINK COLOURED 
Solution containing tetramethyl benzidine (TMB)
R10：	STOPPING SOLUTION 
1N sulphuric acid solution
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: 採用單步驟酵素免疫分析技術之「三明治法」，偵測人體血清或血漿中B型肝炎病毒表面抗原。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
